sentences.english: And also why the problems that arose then remain very pressing today.
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼當時所產生的問題至今依然彌足珍貴。

sentences.english: When you get those rare moments of clarity.
sentences.chinese: 對於那些彌足珍貴的清明時刻。

sentences.english: When you have been on Chinese trains, you'll know how precious this is.
sentences.chinese: 當你坐上中國的火車，你會明白這彌足珍貴。

sentences.english: Rhododendron collectors will want to get their hands on one because of its rarity and historical significance.
sentences.chinese: 杜鵑收集者也會很想得到，因爲它的彌足珍貴。

sentences.english: This image is precious to me. But romantic?
sentences.chinese: 這一情景於我很彌足珍貴，但浪漫嗎？

sentences.english: During a panic, confidence is almost as good as gold.
sentences.chinese: 在恐慌期間，信心如赤金一般，彌足珍貴。

sentences.english: The documental files of Korea's Li Dynasty retained in China are of great treasure.
sentences.chinese: 朝鮮李朝在中國保存下來的檔案文書彌足珍貴。

definition: handed down from ancient times/family heirloom
can be counted on one's fingers (idiom)/very few
to place great importance on/to treasure
to load into/to record/to write into/to enter (data)/to go into (the records)/to go down (in history)
to collect in a museum or library/museum collection/library holdings
